data.title: Holiday Bible Week
data.text:
Junior church and club information in Bishop’s Stortford

Community Church Bishop’s Stortford, Water Lane

All age worship together in the main hall at 9.30am and 11.30am. After a short time the children go to Supergang which is made up of three different age appropriate groups.

Creche: 0 - 2 years (available at 9:30am meeting).

Promise Keepers: up to Reception.

Transformers: School years 1 - 6

Revelation: School years 7 - 13 (available at 11:30am meeting).

Baptist Church Bishop’s Stortford, Twyford Road

All age worship from 10:30am then the children go off into separate groups.

Creche: Preschool

Kidzone 1: Nursery & Reception

Kidzone 2: School years 1 & 2

Xplorers: School years 3 - 5

IMPACT 1: School years 6 - 8

IMPACT 2: School years 9+

Other activities that are available the rest of the week are:

Table Tennis Club: Under 18s / Tuesday 7:45pm - 9:00pm

Junior Zone Youth Club: School years 5 & 6 / Every other Thursday 5:45pm - 7:00pm (Term time only)

Zone Youth Club: School years 7 - 13 / Friday 7:30pm - 9:00pm (Term time only)

Messy Church: Twice a year

St. Michaels Church, Wind Hill

Service starts at 10:00am with separate groups for the children.

Creche: Preschool & Nursery

Junior Church: 3 years+ / 9:50am (Not the first Sunday of the month)

All age service: First Sunday of the month

Bridge Youth Church: School years 6 - 11 / First Sunday of the month 5:00pm - 7:00pm (bridgeyouthchurch.com)

Other activities that are available the rest of the week are:

Youth Group: School years 7+ / Every other Tuesday 5:00pm - 6:30pm (Term time only)

Youth Discussion Group: School years 7+ / Every other Sunday 7:30pm - 9:00pm (Term time only)

Young Servers: Enquire for further information.

Choir: Enquire for further information. / Sundays 10:00am & 11:15am

Holy Trinity, South Street

Messy Church & Buffet: Primary years / First Sunday of the month 11:15am *Bridge Youth Church: School years 6 - 11 / First Sunday of the month 5:00pm - 7:00pm (bridgeyouthchurch.com)

Other activities that are available the rest of the week are:

Trinity Tots & Teaspoon Cafe: 0 - 3 years / Friday 9:30am - 10:30am

Methodist Church, South Street

The Sunday service starts at 10:00am with a creche & Sunday clubs for all the children.

Creche: 0 - 3 years

Sunday Club: 3 - 12 years

Messy Church: Enquire for further information

Other activities that are available the rest of the week are:

Badminton: All ages / Enquire for further information

Boys Brigade Anchors: 5 - 8 years / Monday 5:30pm - 6:45pm (Term times only)

Boys Brigade Juniors: 8 - 11 years / Monday 6:30pm - 8:00pm (Term times only)

Boys Brigade Company: 11+ years / Monday 6:30pm - 8:00pm (Term times only)

Girls Brigade Explorers: 5 - 8 years / Tuesday 5:00pm - 6:30pm (Term times only)

Girls Brigade Juniors: 8 - 11 years / Tuesday 6:30pm - 8:00pm (Term times only)

Girls Brigade Seniors: 11+ years / Tuesday 7:00pm - 8:30pm (Term times only)

All Saints Church, Hockerill

The Sunday service starts at 10:00am with Sunday school available. Also on Sunday you'll find

All age service: First Sunday of the month

Family service: 11:30am - 12:30pm

Bridge Youth Church: School years 6 - 11 / First Sunday of the month 5:00pm - 7:00pm (bridgeyouthchurch.com)

Other activities that are available the rest of the week are:

Youth Choir: School years 7+ / Friday 7:30pm - 8:15pm (Term time only)

The Hub Church, Portland Road

The Sunday service starts at 10:30am with kids church registration shortly before.

Hub Kids Church: 10:15am - 11:30am

Other activities that are available the rest of the week are:
